name: 百合婚姻介紹所
description:
▼Story of this game▼[/]
You are a girl who into girls, walked into a yuri dating agency seeking your perfect partner.
You can find many kinds of girls here, a genius inventor, a cute vampire.
Can you able to find 'the one'? Or... go back living your single miserable life?

▼About this game▼[/]
This game is a Speed Dating simulator which player can play as "me" in the game and having dates with more than 7 characters or players can help the girls to find their dates. It's up to the choses that the players made.
There are secrets hidden between the lines that players will come across and players can find all the hidden back story by talking to all of the dates.
Players can enjoy the fun of selecting every possible selective and response to their dates.
